::: {.cell}

### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/MFT1_1.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/MFT1_1_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: MFT1.1.web.orig**, version v2.0) requires review 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MFT1.1.IM.alt**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MFT1.1.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: MFT1.1.web.orig**, version v1.0) superceded 
 - Web navigation (**code: MFT1.1.map.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Deltas-at-Risk** (Tessler et al. 2015).
 - **Tidal-deltas-list** (Goodbred SL, Saito Y  2012).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset        |url                                                        |
|:--------------|:----------------------------------------------------------|
|Deltas-at-Risk |<http://www.globaldeltarisk.net/data.html>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**MFT1.1.IM.alt** (v2.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/MFT1.1.IM.alt_v2.0.tif){target="gisdata"}

**MFT1.1.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**MFT1.1.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/MFT1.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**MFT1.1.map.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/MFT1.1.map.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091025){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MFT1_1_map_orig){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](layers/MFT1.1.map.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](MFT1.1.map.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset        |license_info                                                |
|:--------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------|
|Deltas-at-Risk |Non commercial research :: for commercial  acak@gc.cuny.edu |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Z.D. Tessler, C.J. Vörösmarty, M. Grossberg, I. Gladkova, H. Aizenman, J.P.M. Syvitski, E. Foufoula-Georgiou (2015) *Profiling Risk and Sustainability in Coastal Deltas of the World* **Science** 349(6248), 638-643 [DOI:10.1126/science.aab3574](http:dx.doi.org/10.1126/science.aab3574) 
 - Goodbred SL, Saito Y (2012) *Tide-dominated deltas*. In: **Principles of tidal sedimentology** (Eds. RA Davis, RW Dalrymple), pp 129-149. Springer, Berin. DOI: [10.1007/978-94-007-0123-6_7](https://doi.org/10.1007/978-94-007-0123-6_7)
